    • playerLogin

      public Player playerLogin(String username_dni, String password) throws PlayerNotFoundException, InvalidAdminException
      Method that is able to check if this email already exists and starts the session of the player
      Parameters:
      username_dni - the username or the DNI of the player
      password - the password of the player
      Returns:
      the player that has started the session (Player)
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the player is not found the program will throw this exception with the message: "Invalid username or password."
      InvalidAdminException - if the admin is not valid the program will throw this exception with the message: "The admin password is not valid."

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String password, String email_dni) throws InvalidPasswordException, InvalidChangePassword
      Method that update the password of the player
      Parameters:
      password - the new password of the player
      email_dni - email or dni of the player
      Throws:
      InvalidPasswordException - if the password is not valid the program will throw this exception with the message: "La nova contrasenya té un format no vàlid."
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the player is not found the program will throw this exception with the message: "Invalid username or password."
      InvalidChangePassword
